metadata.title: CVE-2019-15918 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.0.10. SMB2_negotiatein fs/cifs/smb2pdu.c has an out-of-bounds read because data structures areincompletely updated after a change from smb30 to smb21.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15918` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-66-generic - 4.15.0-66.75
linux-image-4.15.0-66-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-66.75
linux-image-4.15.0-66-lowlatency - 4.15.0-66.75
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-66-generic - 4.15.0-66.75
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-66-lowlatency - 4.15.0-66.75
No subscription required

linux-image-5.0.0-23-generic - 5.0.0-23.24~18.04.1
